DOC.brief_summary: Main Hypothesis: laparoscopic surgery is very painful to patient during and after surgery. We would like to compare different analgesic methods.
DOC.brief_title: Intraoperative and Postoperative Analgesia for Laparoscopic Surgery.
DOC.criteria: Laparoscopic (general) Surgery Age>18 ASA<4 Morning surgery Patient refusal contraindication for treatment
